metadata.title: Fomalhaut Labs - Make AI Touchable to Everyone
metadata.description: Fomalhaut Labs provides the same AI coding ability as OpenAI, Claude, and Google, with much lower prices for startup teams and individual developers.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Building the bridge between advanced AI and everyday developers.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make AI touchable to everyone, democratizing access to powerful coding tools for individuals and small teams.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where every developer, regardless of resources, can leverage state-of-the-art AI to build the future.

history.title: Our Story
history.description: Established in September 2025, Fomalhaut Labs began with a simple idea: AI shouldn't be a luxury. From our roots in Singapore and Shanghai, we've grown into a global community.

founders.title: Leadership
founders.description: Led by industry veterans from Alibaba, Shopee, and HKU, bringing decades of experience in Machine Learning and Distributed Systems.

contactUs.title: How can we assist?
contactUs.subtitle: We are here to help you.
contactUs.supportTeam: Our team is dedicated to providing excellent support

productsPage.title: Our Products
productsPage.subtitle: Explore our suite of AI-powered tools designed to accelerate your development journey.

hero.title: Make AI Touchable to Everyone
hero.description: We provide the same AI coding ability as the mainstream AI providers like OpenAI, Claude, and Google, with much lower price for startup teams and individual developers.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.subtitle: Milestones that define our progress and commitment to excellence.

items.title: Company Established
items.description: Fomalhaut Labs was founded with the mission to democratize AI.

items.title: CS61B & Beyond
items.description: Launched our first curated educational platform for CS students.

items.title: Claude IDE
items.description: Released a powerful, accessible mirror for AI-driven development.

items.title: Code I
items.description: Expanded our portfolio with high-performance code generation tools.

items.title: 100+ Members
items.description: Reached a significant milestone of 100+ subscribed developers.

items.title: Code By AI
items.description: Introduced our flagship AI assistant at a fraction of the cost.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Tools designed to empower your learning and development journey.

items.title: CS61B & Beyond
items.description: A comprehensive collection website for top-tier Computer Science open courses from leading universities. Accelerate your CS education with curated resources.
features: Covers CS open courses from top universities
Courses are organized by category or field
items.useCase: Designed for CS self-learners to easily discover what to learn and access curated open course resources from top institutions.

items.title: Code By AI
items.description: The ultimate AI coding assistant mirror. Access Claude Code, Codex, and Gemini models for just 1/6th of the official price. Power your development for less.
features: Multi-Model Support (Claude/GPT/Gemini) — top up once and use all of them
Deep code understanding for complex, large-scale projects
items.useCase: Designed for developers who want to use Claude, Codex (GPT), and Gemini models at the same time with very low cost.
pricing: Price is approximately 1/6 of the official pricing

items.title: Claude IDE
items.description: A mirror website of Claude, providing the same powerful AI conversational capabilities at a much lower price point. Accessible AI for everyone.
features: Supports Claude Sonnet 4.5 and Claude Opus 4.5
Deep code understanding for complex, large-scale projects
Seamless integration via CLI or IDE plugins (VS Code/JetBrains)
Command with natural language—no programming skills required
items.useCase: Empowering both professional developers and non-coders to manage and build complex projects using intuitive natural language commands.
pricing: Cache input takes 10% discount (e.g., 10K cache + 1K input + 0.5K output costs 2.5K tokens)

items.title: Code I
items.description: A mirror website of OpenAI Codex. Experience top-level code generation and assistance without the high cost.
features: Deep code understanding for complex, large-scale projects
Seamless integration via CLI or IDE plugins (VS Code/JetBrains)
Command with natural language—no programming skills required
items.useCase: Empowering developers to generate and refactor code using the latest GPT-5.2 models with intuitive natural language commands.

team.title: Our Background
team.subtitle: A world-class team with experience from top tech giants and universities.

testimonials.title: What Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Feedback from our community.
testimonials.footerText: Join thousands of developers empowering their development with Fomalhaut Labs.

items.name: Alex T.
items.feedback: CS61B & Beyond helped me ace my data structures course. The curated resources are invaluable!

items.name: Sarah L.
items.feedback: Claude IDE is a lifesaver. I get the same powerful AI assistance but at a price that fits my budget.

items.name: David K.
items.feedback: Code By AI allows me to use top-tier models like Claude Code without breaking the bank. Highly recommended!

footer.description: Fomalhaut Labs - Democratizing AI for everyone.
